updateElements.informationButtonText: More Info About Updates At Figma
updateElements.mainContentHeader: Your device will restart during this update
updateElements.mainContentSubHeader: Updates can take around 20-40 minutes to complete.
updateElements.mainContentText:
A fully up-to-date device is required to ensure the security of Figma's data.

If you do not update by the due date, you will effectively be locked out of your system until you complete the update.

The update has been rigorously tested it's advised you do this as soon as possible to avoid any disruption to your work.

To begin the update, simply click on the Update Device button and follow the prompts.

For more information, hit *More Info* in the bottom left corner of this window.
updateElements.mainHeader: Your device requires a macOS Security Update
updateElements.subHeader: A friendly reminder from your local Figma IT team
